item.title: Hello N64
item.description: Looking back, I still have a lot of fondness for those awkward early years of 3D games. Since that time I've developed some idea of how a computer works at all. So why not try making one of these games? How does one produce a program and run it on the hardware of a Nintendo 64?

item.title: Introductions
item.description: I make software. There are a lot of topics in that space that I think are interesting, and even more that I know too little about. I bounce between them all the time, but I've done a less than stellar job of documenting these adventures. So here we are!
